job_tasks.phrase: Ontwikkelen en optimaliseren van implementaties van taalmodellen
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the development and optimization of language models, which is a core aspect of generative AI modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementeren van betrouwbare en efficiënte data pipelines voor de verzameling, opslag, verwerking en analyse van grote hoeveelheden data
job_tasks.justification: This clearly describes the responsibilities related to building and managing data pipelines, a key component of data engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Samenwerken met Digital Product Teams om technische oplossingen te ontwerpen die gebruikmaken van onze standaard bouwblokken voor de implementatie van nieuwe digitale producten
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in designing and implementing technical solutions within product teams, aligning with software development practices.

job_tasks.phrase: Speel een cruciale rol in onze strategische visie en innovatie.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the contribution to the company's strategic vision and innovation, suggesting an understanding of business goals.
Analyzing data needs implies understanding the business requirements that drive data initiatives.

job_tasks.phrase: optimaliseer digitale producten met Large Language Models
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing digital products using LLMs involves software development practices to integrate and enhance product functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Continu verbeteren van de datakwaliteit en verwerkingsefficiëntie door het implementeren van moderne datatechnologieën en best practices.
job_tasks.justification: Continuously improving data quality and processing efficiency through modern technologies and best practices aligns with operational excellence and MLOps principles.

soft_skills.phrase: werkt nauw samen met Digital Product Teams
Samenwerken met zowel Technische Platform Teams als Digital Product Teams
De nieuwste trends en ontwikkelingen volgen

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the development and optimization of language models, a core responsibility of a GenAI Engineer. It also highlights building RAG systems and working with LLM implementations, further solidifying this classification. While data engineering tasks are present, they are in service of the GenAI initiatives.
